code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    Cancelled --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    state Created {IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    }

    state InProgress {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Blocked
        [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> Done
        [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        PartiallyDone --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    }
repo_description: Free and Open Source ERP platform
